description: A massive rhinoceros serves as a platform for several small birds. One bird perched near its head makes an unusual request regarding the rhino's ears. This scenario is highly surreal, portraying birds engaging in a seemingly clinical or familiar interaction with a large, wild mammal. The absurdity lies in the power dynamic reversal and the mundane nature of the request within such an extraordinary context. It highlights the unexpected relationships that might exist in the natural world, albeit in a whimsical, non-literal way.
caption: "Mind if we check the ears?"
